affects:
ABILITY: Point Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Units
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
desc: Tusk compresses shards of ice into a ball of frozen energy that damages all enemies it comes in contact with. When the ball reaches its target destination the shards are released, creating a barrier that lasts for 7 seconds.
attrib:
RADIUS: 200
SHARD DAMAGE: 70/140/210/280
SHARD DURATION: 7
CAST RANGE: 1800
cmb:
90
19/16/13/10
lore: In the frozen tundra near the Barrier, after the last sun of autumn has set, ice can form with alarming speed.
name: tusk_ice_shards

affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Units
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
desc: Tusk begins rolling into a snowball. Allies within a 400 radius can also be added to the snowball by right-clicking on them, even while the snowball is moving. Once launched, any enemies caught in the snowball's path will be stunned and take damage. Each allied Hero in the snowball will add to its damage.
notes:
The snowball destroys trees.
The snowball travels at 675 movement speed.
Doesn't carry illusions, but will carry Meepo clones and other units that Tusk controls.
Each Meepo clone added to the snowball will add its own bonus damage and speed.
Allies can click on a snowball to add themselves to it.
attrib:
BASE DAMAGE: 80/120/160/200
BONUS DAMAGE PER ALLY: 20/30/40/50
STUN DURATION: 0.5/0.75/1/1.25
GATHER RADIUS: 100
LAUNCH TIME: 4
cmb:
75/75/75/75
21/20/19/18
lore: Tales are still told of the wild feat that ended the grand brawl at White Fields.
name: tusk_snowball

desc: Launch the snowball toward the target.
notes:
The snowball destroys trees.
The snowball travels at 675 movement speed.
Doesn't carry illusions, but will carry Meepo clones and other units that Tusk controls.
Each Meepo clone added to the snowball will add its own bonus damage and speed.
name: tusk_launch_snowball

affects:
ABILITY: No Target
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
desc: Tusk summons a Frozen Sigil by calling upon the deepest cold of winter. The Sigil creates a snowstorm which slows all enemy units within 600 range.
notes:
If no order is given, the Sigil will follow Tusk.
The Sigil flies, has a 310 MS, 3/3/4/4 HP, 400/400 vision, and gives a 90/100/110/120 gold bounty.
Works fully on Spell Immune units.
Heroes deal 1 damage to the sigil, while non-hero units deal 0.25 damage.
cmb:
75/75/75/75
50
name: tusk_frozen_sigil

affects:
ABILITY: Auto-Cast, Unit Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Units
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
desc:
Tusk connects with his mighty Walrus Punch, a critical strike so powerful it launches its victim into the air. The victim is slowed upon landing.
Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
notes:
Walrus Punch cannot miss.
Works fully on Spell Immune units.
attrib:
CRIT MULTIPLIER: 350%
AIR TIME: 1
SLOW DURATION: 2/3/4
MOVEMENT SLOW: 40%
cmb:
50/75/100
20/16/12
lore: It never matters who throws the first punch, only who throws the last.
name: tusk_walrus_punch
